idea:
Soltns is a disruptive unicorn with portfolio of solutions in B2C, B2B, and B2G space. With minimum or no usage of perishable, non-recyclable materials/elements/resources. Registered soltns with IndieGogo, KickStarter, Arrow Electronics+AT&T Innovation Award 2019, Edison Awards 2019-2020, YCombinator, TechStars, Austin Capital Factory, Portland Seed Fund, Rockefeller Foundation,. Kaufmann Foundation, Rothschild Foundation.


Apparently, no one dares to judge, challenge, or ask - Apple, Google, Microsoft for being an integrated B2B-B2B-B2G solutions company. While new innovative startups/entrepreneurs are asked-misjudged by investors and VCs? Hypocrisy aside, the value proposition is to consistently design, produce/market/sell via website (www.soltns.com) and Android/Apple mobile playstores.


The solutions/products listed on soltns.com are made by us, vendors (China-Taiwan-India-Malaysia-Thailand-USA-Germany), and/or by business partners that have niche in domains of Sustainability, Automation, IOT, and AI. The portfolio of Sustainable Automation Solutions are coincidentally in sync with short-and-long term goals of the Agenda 2030 of United Nation, serving ever-growing needs of 2+ Billion people in six sectors, including B2C, B2G, B2B.

In July 2017, I successfully filed a US Patent Application for Soltns' first viable product/prototype/solution. The inspiration for Soltns came about as I had already filed multiple US Patents in 2002-2005 in USA including Artificial Robotic Hands and Artificial Robotic Limbs with Dr. Robert Leander (Professor of Biomedical & Electrical Engineering - Southern Illinois Univ Edwardsville).  Elec.Engineering Dept, US Solar Car Challenge (2004 - way before Tesla conceptualized).


Strategy for fastest-realistic scaling and growth: In the near future, I'll launch it as an Ireland (GHQ) and an S-or-C corp in Delaware, with ideal listing on NYSE and Indian BSE/NSE, both before 2023. Or, earlier if we acquire and turnaround a business in USA or India with similar nature of business, with clean books/records. While, I'm flexible to follow the valuable suggestions of StartUpIndia's mentors, panel, investors.
name: https://www.soltns.com
